thread.title: Ground News - READ BACK ISRAEL. “20 dead in Israeli attack on Rafah” - Israel and Hamas receive Egyptian proposal to end war 28/12
thread.title_full: Ground News - READ BACK ISRAEL. “20 dead in Israeli attack on Rafah” - Israel and Hamas receive Egyptian proposal to end war 28/12

author: Het Laatste Nieuws
title: Ground News - READ BACK ISRAEL. “20 dead in Israeli attack on Rafah” - Israel and Hamas receive Egyptian proposal to end war 28/12
text:
Summary by Het Laatste Nieuws The Israeli army is focusing its operations on the center of the Gaza Strip today, despite the critical situation for civilians and calls for a ceasefire. In addition, the Israeli forces would prepare for a possible offensive against the Shiite militia Hezbollah in Lebanon. That's what Israel's army chief of staff, Herzi Halevi, said. Follow all developments in our live blog. Share menu More
